// Set nested values immutably
const forest = new Forest({ value: { user: { name: 'John', age: 30 } } })

// Update nested property
forest.set(['user', 'name'], 'Jane')
console.log(forest.value.user.name) // 'Jane'

// Set entire object
forest.set(['user'], { name: 'Bob', age: 25 })
console.log(forest.value.user) // { name: 'Bob', age: 25 }
